\d...Satisfied now?\d%K%P
I switched on the lights, cutting through the\ndarkness.%K%P
The light allowed me to see Yukari's face clearly.%K%P
\dWhat's with that reaction? Shouldn't you be more\nafraid? Fearful? Anything but this!\d%K%P
\dMe? Afraid of you? Don't be silly.\d%K%P
\dI'm not being silly! Don't say that!\d%K%P
She was trying to be all scary and devilish, but to\nme this was nothing more than an extension of her\nusual personality.%K%P
Having seen that side of her for such a long time,\nI knew the real Yukari.%K%P
\dYou're not afraid at all? We're all locked up in\nhere, you know?\d%K%P
\dI was so sure you would be terrified to the point\nof wetting your pants. Which I would then clean for\nyou of course, hehehe!\d%K%P
This was the Yukari I knew, without a doubt.%K%P
\dThere's no point trying to make yourself look like\na villain now.\d%K%P
\dI married you fully aware of that aspect of your\npersonality.\d%K%P
\dIf you ask me, this Tatari barrier thing is going\na tad overboard though.\d%K%P
It didn't feel like my powers were resisting it.%K%P
Instead of filling the space like a gaseous\nsubstance, the Tatari surrounded the vicinity with\nsomething akin to a thin membrane.%K%P
\dWh-What do we do now?\d%K%P
\dYou should be able to break out of here pretty\neasily, if you want...\d%K%P
\dHmm...\d%K%P
I probably I could get out without too much\ntrouble.%K%P
We'd just have to leave the forest, and the barrier\nshould break apart like brittle paper.%K%P
\dNah, why don't we stay a while more?\d%K%P
\dHuh?\d%K%P
\dThis'll be a good chance for us to have a\nheart-to-heart talk in private.\d%K%P
Yukari clearly had a lot of pent-up resentment.%K%P
While that explosion of Tatari probably got some\nout of her system, there was no telling what might\nhappen if we didn't resolve the root cause of it.%K%P
\dAll those things you usually think and feel but\ndon't tell me about...\d%K%P
\dNow's the time to get them all out in the open. I\nwant to know what's really on your mind.\d%K%P
Yukari's frustration had been dispelled by her\nventing just now.%K%P
That process might hold the key to transforming her\nfrom a Tatarigami to a regular Goddess.%K%P
*sniff* \d...You'd hate me if you knew.\d%K%P
\dI won't, I promise.\d%K%P
\dLike how I want to bite you, kiss you, just\nconsume you...\d%K%P
\dWhat if I told you there were other things I\nwanted to do to you too?\d%K%P
\dI might not give you the go-ahead to do them, but\nI won't hate you.\d%K%P
\dUgh... You're so odd, not hating someone like me.\d%K%P
\dIt's because I know you have a lot of strengths. I\ncan forgive a strange fetish or two.\d%K%P
\dWe are husband and wife, after all.\d%K%P
This must be what the bond between lovers was all\nabout.%K%P
To accept not just the good parts about each other,\nbut the flaws and imperfections as well.%K%P
This acceptance was the basis for our desire to\nstay together, 'til death do us part.%K%P
*sob* \d...I love you so much, I feel like I'm\nlosing myself...\d%K%P
\dThere, there.\d%K%P
I moved to give Yukari a comforting pat, but\nquickly retracted my hand.%K%P
\dYou're not going to pat my head?\d%K%P
\dIf I touch you now, the Tatari will fall apart.\d%K%P
\dOh...\d%K%P
If Yukari's Tatari made this barrier, my powers\nwould kick in when I made contact with the source.%K%P
\dSo we can't touch each other?\d%K%P
\dNot for a while, anyway. Just bear with it, okay?\d%K%P
\dThat's too much for me to bear!\d%K%P
\dWe can stay like this for as long as you like.\nI'll only break the barrier when you feel like\ngoing outside again.\d%K%P
\dWhat if we're really stuck here forever?\d%K%P
\dWe'll cross that bridge when we come to it. Though\nI guess I wouldn't mind, as long as it meant I\ncould be with you.\d%K%P
\dYou're treating this so lightly again... Doesn't\nit worry you at all?\d%K%P
\dHaha! We'll be fine.\d%K%P
\dI have faith in my wife.\d%K%P
Despite this little hassle, things were progressing\nrather well.%K%P
Yukari had revealed to me what she kept hidden in\nher heart, and I could see this leading to a\nsolution eventually.%K%P
Now we just had to think about what to do next.%K%P
\dAkira... May I request a favor?\d%K%P
\dSure, what is it? Don't be shy.\d%K%P
\dUmm, I'm happy for your kind words, but they're\nnot enough to completely satisfy me, so...\d%K%P
\dI really want to stay together in this private\nspace for just a little while more.\d%K%P
\dCan we do that?\d%K%P
\dI told you not to be shy, didn't I?\d%K%P
\dYou should let me know about your desires like\nthis more often.\d%K%P
\dBut...\d%K%P
\dI might say things like, I want to lick you all\nover, from your neck to your knees... Even in\nbetween your shoulder blades.\d%K%P
\dSee? See? You're drawing away from me! That's why\nI'm always controlling myself!\d%K%P
What was it with Yukari and licking?%K%P
What was so fun about licking other people, anyway?%K%P
\dI was just surprised, that's all.\d%K%P
\dIf that's what you really want, then go ahead.\d%K%P
I exposed my neck to Yukari.%K%P
\dAaargh! Stop making yourself look so vulnerable!\d%K%P
\dIt's like waving a piece of bloodied meat in front\nof a starving lion...\d%K%P
\dYou have no idea how dangerous that is!\d%K%P
\dI-I can't take it anymore! Here I come!\d%K%P
She leapt for my neck, but stopped short just a few\ninches away from it.%K%P
\dI almost forgot. Our time alone here ends if I\ntouch you.\d%K%P
\dOh, right. Sorry, I wasn't thinking.\d%K%P
While we stayed here, the world was ours and ours\nalone.%K%P
But the moment we touched the spell would break,\nand we would find ourselves back in reality.%K%P
\dYou're right here in front of me, but I can't do a\nthing...\d%K%P
\dWe can't do a lot here, since a single touch would\nmean the end of this.\d%K%P
\dThere are plenty of ways to enjoy our time without\nmaking direct contact.\d%K%P
\dSo let's just spend the night here, just being\nwith each other!\d%K%P
I checked my disconnected smartphone and saw that\nit was nearly noon.%K%P
We'd need some supplies if we were going to stay\nhere until the next morning.%K%P
\dThere's running water and a toilet here, so I\nguess that part's settled.\d%K%P
\dThe electricity works, so we have lighting too.\d%K%P
\dWhich means all that's left is food.\d%K%P
We wouldn't die without food for a day.%K%P
But I didn't want to suffer either, there was no\npoint in going hungry if we didn't have to.%K%P
\dI'm sure Shion's stashed food here somewhere.\d%K%P
\dYeah, I wouldn't be surprised to find an unopened\npack of potato chips. Let's search around.\d%K%P
Yukari and I split up and started searching for\nfood.%K%P
We found some a lot faster than I thought.%K%P
\dAkira! I found something good!\d%K%P
\dLook! Instant udon!\d %K%P
This would be perfect for a nighttime snack.%K%P
\dI found something too. Instant fried soba.\d%K%P
\dJust the kind of food you'd get cravings for in\nthe middle of the night.\d%K%P
\dWell, we won't go hungry with these here.\d%K%P
\dWait, won't we need hot water to make them\nedible?\d%K%P
\dI'm sure there's some around. Why would she keep\ninstant food around if there wasn't any hot\nwater?\d%K%P
Unless Shion was the type that liked to chew on\ndried noodles raw...%K%P
She was quite the connoisseur when it came to junk\nfood, so I couldn't imagine her eating like that.%K%P
\dIt looks like there really is no way to heat water\nin here.\d%K%P
There was a shower, but it only went up to a mild\ntemperature.%K%P
Since there was no gas pipe here, Shion must have\nbeen using electricity to boil water...%K%P
\dThe electric kettle she was using at home...\nMaybe she took it from here?\d%K%P
\dAnd the portable stove too. She could have been\nusing that to do some simple cooking.\d%K%P
\dHot water's out of the question, then...\d%K%P
That was a bummer. We couldn't cook anything\nwithout hot water.%K%P
\dMaybe we should skip the main meal and see if we\ncan find snacks or something.\d%K%P
\dSounds good. Time to continue the search.\d%K%P
We started rummaging through Shion's scattered\nbelongings again.%K%P
There were a lot of games and electronic items.\nEmpty boxes, too.%K%P
\dHow often does she order stuff online...?\d%K%P
\dWe get a lot of her deliveries at the main hall.\nKaede reprimands her for it every time.\d%K%P
\dShion never changes.\d%K%P
All the Goddesses in my shrine were like that.%K%P
Kaede looked all prim and proper, but she could be\npretty careless, too. Not to mention how fussy she\nsometimes got.%K%P
\dWhoa, what's this...?\d%K%P
I found a pair of girls underwear.%K%P
\dI don't think those will do you any good, Akira.\d%K%P
There was a hint of intimidation to Yukari's smile.%K%P
\dR-Right... It's not like we can eat them.\d%K%P
\dIf it ever got to that point, I'd prefer you eat\nmine instead.\d%K%P
\dWifely panties are edible. I'll have to remember\nthat!\d%K%P
\dYou've gotta be kidding me. You can't eat\nunderwear, no matter what kind it is!\d%K%P
Wait, whose were these, anyway?%K%P
Considering where I'd found them, they had to be\nShion's, right? Or maybe Kaede's?%K%P
\dA...ki...raaa?\d%K%P
\dWhoa! Don't come so close to me out of the blue!\d%K%P
\dStop checking those panties out. It doesn't matter\nwho they used to belong to!\d%K%P
\dIt's not about the underwear, but the person\nwearing them, don't you think?\d%K%P
Whispering sweetly in my ear, she rolled up the hem\nof her skirt.%K%P
Perhaps she was trying to catch my attention by\noffering an enticing glimpse or two.%K%P
\dYukari?\d%K%P
\dHehehe! Just say the word and I'll show you.\d%K%P
\dNot just underwear, but the person underneath as\nwell...\d%K%P
Yukari continued to lift her skirt, hovering\nright on the edge of revealing too much.%K%P
I knew she was toying with me with her playful\nhem-swinging, but I couldn't help but stare.%K%P
\dIf you want, we can even go further...\d%K%P
\dAs your wife, I'll do whatever I can to satisfy\nyour every desire.\d%K%P
\dYou can touch me anywhere you want...\d%K%P
\dTh-That's not a good idea.\d%K%P
Touching was off limits if we wanted to keep the\nTatari barrier up.%K%P
\dBut you want to, don't you?\d%K%P
\d...Yes.\d%K%P
\dThen stop holding yourself back. Life's best when\nyou live according to your desires!\d%K%P
\dCome on, scoot over a little closer.\d%K%P
She waved her skirt about as if in invitation.%K%P
I couldn't believe how bold she was getting just\nbecause I couldn't touch her.%K%P
\dWhat's the matter? Every part of me belongs to\nyou, so you don't have to stand on ceremony.\d%K%P
\dI'm not holding back. My not touching you is for\nyour own good.\d%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
\dStill, I'm glad that you are so comfortable around\nme.\d%K%P
\dI could never imagine you doing this a while ago,\nit's proof of how far we have come.\d%K%P
Neither of us would've been happy inside the\nbarrier if Yukari had remained in full Tatarigami\nmode.%K%P
She'd improved to the point where this odd\nsituation didn't seem to bother her anymore.%K%P
\dI thought I was the one doing the tempting...\d%K%P
\dYet you're the one making me fall harder for you!\nHow is it you can still be so cool while obviously\ndistracted by my underwear?\d%K%P
\dFine, I won't ask you to touch me anymore. In\nexchange...\d%K%P
\dPlease...say that you love me.\d%K%P
She quickly switched from teasing to serious mode.%K%P
Looking straight into my eyes, she made her earnest\nrequest.%K%P
\dYukari...\d%K%P
\dI love you, Yukari. I really do...\d%K%P
\dHehe!\d%K%P
\dI love you to pieces too, Akira!\d%K%P
\dLet's make up for today by getting touchy-feely\nafter we get back!\d%K%P
